titles.title: HP773 Jesus, united by thy grace

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus, united by thy grace
And each to each endeared,
With confidence we seek thy face,
And know our prayer is heard.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Still let us own our common Lord,
And bear thine easy yoke,
A band of love, a threefold cord,
Which never can be broke.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
Touched by the lodestone of thy love,
Let all our hearts agree,
And ever t'ward each other move,
And ever move t'ward thee.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
To thee, inseparably joined,
Let all our spirits cleave;
O may we all the loving mind
That was in thee receive.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
This is the bond of perfectness,
Thy spotless charity;
O let us (still we pray) possess
The mind that was in thee.
